name: Simple Snake | 2-Player!
description:
Description

A classic Snake game  - but with a twist.  Want to play 2 player? Hop on in and out survive your player 2!  Want to play solo?   Red blocks spawn around the map while playing, you must avoid these otherwise its a game over!

NEW UPDATE (2.0)

Revamped skin select screen, improved free edition background colour and... 2-Player mode has been added! Not enough?  A second Gold Edition skin has been added too!

Gold Edition

Gold Edition gives access gold exclusive skins and  differently coloured menus!

Gold Edition uses the same save file as the  regular edition - you will keep your high scores!

Controls

Movement: WASD (Player 1) &  Arrow Keys (Player 2),  Pause:  Space, Main Menu: Esc
